archimate:Goal.name: Policies and capabilities for Security Monitoring defined
archimate:Goal.documentation:
policies and procedures that define logging requirements in detail for all systems
Defining policies e.g. what logs to collect from each system, system support, securing log data, scope for the service. Identify and define security policies as well as identifying legal and regulatory requirements regarding the security monitoring capabilities Identifying a Risk Management Strategy Defining capabilities the service must support.
